<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 539</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If you've established trade agreements, you can use the [Manage Trade Agreements](/Actions.aspx?ID=1408) activity.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
